about_the_game:
Epic Monster Quest is an action-packed idle RPG where you build a team of heroes, engage in continuous combat, and upgrade your squad to take on increasingly powerful enemies. Set in a dynamic fantasy world, Epic Monster Quest combines strategic decision-making with automated battles, allowing you to progress even while you're away.

Key Features

⚔️ Continuous Combat – Your heroes fight automatically, earning rewards and experience even when you're offline.

🔄 Upgrades & Progression – Unlock new skills, enhance equipment, and strengthen your heroes to tackle tougher challenges.

🌎 Expansive World – Battle across various themed environments filled with unique monsters and encounters.

📜 Evolving Story – Discover the lore behind the world of Epic Monster Quest as the game evolves with new updates.

🏆 Idle & Active Playstyles – Whether you like to micromanage battles or let your heroes handle the fight, Epic Monster Quest adapts to your playstyle.

🎖️ Prestige System – Reset for greater rewards, unlocking new abilities and strategies for deeper progression.

Join the adventure, build your ultimate team, and conquer the endless battle in Epic Monster Quest!
